title: More than Music
description: One forbidden kiss changes everything…but our secret romance might tear our band apart.Everyone knows geeky girls like me don't get to be rock stars. But when tattooed singer Jared Cross invites me to join his band on a reality TV show competition, how can I refuse?There's just one don't sleep with anyone in the band.Not a problem. Really.Until I discover there’s more to Jared than his flirty smile, sinful voice, and bad boy reputation. Until one forbidden kiss changes everything.I thought I could resist him. I was wrong. Now our secret romance might tear our band apart and cost us the win.Is following my dream worth losing my heart?
author: Elizabeth Briggs
